name: Axe Deo Dark Temptation, Rock
description: Twist top open to reveal nozzle. Hold the can six inches from your body and press the nozzle to spray. A quick spray across your chest does the trick. The Axe deodorant dark temptation body spray provides an irresistible chocolate fragrance which is long lasting (upto over 24 hours) and it is safe on skin as well. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
